          <title>
            <string language="en">Polyribosomes</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the translation of RNA to produce protein molecules by means of polyribosomes</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la traduction de l'ARN

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a tradução do RNA às

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la traducción del RNA
